mapper.select:
SELECT ITEM_ID -- 측정항목 ID , ITEM_NM -- 측정항목명 , UNIT -- 측정단위 , REF_FROM -- 참고치 From , REF_TO -- 참고치 TO , DEL_YN -- 삭제여부 , REG_ID , REG_DT , UPD_ID , UPD_DT FROM ITEM
WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND ITEM_ID = #{itemId}
AND ITEM_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{itemNm}, '%')
ORDER BY ITEM_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET Item_NM = #{itemNm} -- 측정항목명 , UNIT = #{unit} -- 측정단위 , UPD_ID = #{updId} -- 수정자 WHERE ITEM_ID = #{itemId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM item WHERE ITEM_ID = #{itemId} -- 측정항목Id
